alert.note: Alert for Weber (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 20 at 11:52AM MDT until further notice by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Utah... South Fork of The Ogden River Near Huntsville affecting Weber County. Sevier River Near Hatch affecting Garfield, Kane, Piute, Sevier and Iron Counties. .Warm temperatures and upstream dam releases will continue to result in increased river flows. For the Sevier River...including Hatch...Moderate flooding is forecast. For the South Fork of the Ogden River near Huntsville...minor flooding will continue. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...South Fork of The Ogden River Near Huntsville. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 4.6 feet (992 CFS), low lying areas near the banks of the South Fork of the Ogden River below Causey Reservoir through the town of Huntsville will receive minor flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:15 AM MDT Saturday the stage was 4.6 feet or about 1100 CFS. - Forecast...The river is forecast to remain above minor flood stage through at least the next 7 days. - Flood stage is 4.6 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 445 AM MDT.
